title: Can Star Wars Outlaws Be Fixed?
description:
Will it be the next Cyberpunk 2077? 

From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cnyhoEUHxd0 

Phasmophobia is out now PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29.
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first months.


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

YouTube: Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/

end quote since launch and has identified key areas where it can Elevate the game experience to better meet player expectations sentiments such as these are often seen in the wake of disastrous game launches but Star Wars Outlaws uh debuted to positive reviews poor sales shook a struggling Ubisoft however and it is now working to improve the game ahead of what it hopes will be a sales bump alongside its steam launch and the holiday period this will result in Star Wars Outlaws getting revamped combat stealth and controls quote the first key area of improvement to the game is combat where we see a real opportunity to add more depth and excitement to the experience further further rewarding your tactics and precision reckner said our second key area is stealth which is not only about improving the readability and consistency of enemy detection but also providing choice in how you want to to approach each encounter finally our third key area of focus is centered around the character
